data.text: @SpiceyMcBrady Nice! Yeah I was going slow then covid hit so I was lucky to just sit and do that for a couple days 😅 it has been to long and this one is so fresh! Enjoy! 🙂

@ItsIffyTV I like it so far! I have barely played though just barely got my outfit after getting my starter. Going slow and have not had a chance to couch potato the game yet for hours. But I am excited to play a Pokemon game it has been too long!

@SpiceyMcBrady Yay! How are you enjoying it? I hadnt really dived into a game since Lets go Pikachu and before that was Pokemon Platinum. I dont wanna spoil anything. Sooo Im just gunna say WOW to the story. So many times i was like woah! Such a blast!
@ItsIffyTV I just started this game last night!!! I have not played a Pokemon game since Diamond on the DS so I am stoked to play!!
@Protocolypse I've thought about it, could do another Playthrough, and hell yeah it was, SUPER refreshing.
@ItsIffyTV It's such a cool and new way of playing Pokemon, if you're up for streaming it! You should! https://t.co/qtfQK5DkxS
